nodes.text: Star Wars Galaxy Magazine 3 is the third issue of Star Wars Galaxy Magazine. It was published by Topps in April 1995. The Deluxe Collectors' Edition of issue 3, exclusive to subscribers and comic stores, came polybagged with 1995 Topps Star Wars: The Empire Strikes Back Widevision promotional card #0, a Topps Finest chromium AT-AT trading card, and a Star Wars milk cap featuring either C-3PO or Darth Vader. This issue also included the fold-out poster article The Essential Guide to Star Wars Aliens.
